quotes: You don’t have to be positive all the time. It’s perfectly okay to feel sad, angry, annoyed, frustrated, scared and anxious. Having feelings doesn’t make you a negative person. It makes you human.
There is a crack in everything, that’s how the light gets in.
Mental health problems don’t define who you are. They are something you experience. You walk in the rain and you feel the rain, but you are not the rain.
If you are broken, you do not have to stay broken.
Not until we are lost do we begin to understand ourselves.
There is hope, even when your brain tells you there isn’t.
Promise me you’ll always remember: you’re braver than you believe, and stronger than you seem, and smarter than you think.
If you’re going through hell, keep going.
Change what you can, manage what you can’t.
Mental health affects every aspect of your life. It’s not just this neat little issue you can put into a box.
